TITLE: AI As Test Audience
DEF: Critiquing text to evaluate how an audience understands it
TASK: The AI critique pattern employs generative AI models to review and evaluate educational concepts, arguments, and materials. Just like a human reviewer, an AI model might misunderstand the material, or overlook nuances in complex content, or find arguments unconvincing. This provides valuable feedback on potential points of confusion or ambiguity, where misunderstandings need to be addressed, where arguments should be more clearly developed, or where subtle aspects need to be made more explicit to not be overlooked. Functioning as a 'test audience', the AI provides immediate feedback that creators can use for rapid, iterated improvement of the overall clarity and accessibility of their material.
